question: How did the state of the funnel change?
options: The funnel was picked up and moved to the hole of the oil tank, then removed without the oil being poured.
The funnel was picked up and moved to the hole of the oil tank, then filled with oil.
The funnel was picked up and slightly tilted, but it was not moved to the hole of the oil tank.
